title: Happy Birthday, Setsuna-chan!
detail_text: <:th_ch0106/>Happy birthday, Setsuna! Here, a present from Yohane!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0207/>Thank you very much. Hmhm, I wonder what it could be? How exciting... Huh!? I-Is this...!?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0106/>On Yohane’s birthday, we watched a movie based on a light novel, and you gifted her the bracelet the protagonist was wearing, right? So this is-<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0207/>The tiara worn by the rival character!!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0106/>Correct!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0207/>Thank you very much... Yohane-san...!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0106/>It’s not Yoshiko, it’s Yoha… huh?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0207/>For you to give this to me, you must have recognized me… as the garrison of the fallen angel Yohane!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0106/>Huh? Garrison? What’s that?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0207/>Ah! I-I’m sorry, I spoke so carelessly… When the legions of angels attack, I swear to protect you, Yohane-san. In the movie, the hero and the rival character worked together to defeat a great enemy, so you’ve trusted me with that role, haven’t you♪ I swear to do my best!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0106/>Wait, um... Yohane by herself is strong enough, so it should be fine...?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0207/>And just like the main character, you’ve declined the offer to work together!! Now I'm completely sure~♪<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0106/>Uh...!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0000/>Translated by SIFAStheatre and Idol Story<:dt_line_end/>
